name: Kogent Defender
description:
Kogent Defender enlists you to protect your home world from an encroaching enemy known as the Virtera. Under the command of the Kogent Mind you will take on this alien infestation and work to eliminate it completely.

Features

  • Twin stick dual weapon wielding action
  • Randomised extermination levels
  • Boss levels
  • Wave based endless levels
  • Custom player load outs
